parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster. If the ClusterType parameter is not set to `cloud-product-prometheus` or `cms-enterprise-prometheus`, you must specify the ClusterId parameter.

parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description:
The cluster type. Valid values:

*   vpc-prometheus
*   cloud-product-prometheus
*   cms-enterprise-prometheus
*   ExternalKubernetes
*   Ask
*   Kubernetes
*   ManagedKubernetes
*   remote-write-prometheus
*   GlobalViewV2

parameters.name: DataSourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the data source. Valid values:

*   loki
*   prometheus

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the dashboard group.

parameters.name: OnlyQuery
parameters.description: Specifies whether to display the Grafana dashboard only in the Application Real-Time Monitoring Service (ARMS) console.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The abbreviation of the Alibaba Cloud service name.
